changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.18

### On-Demand Loading Fix
- Fixed categories 16+ being empty in TV, Film, and Series sections
- On-demand loading now correctly triggers when scrolling to empty categories

### Build System Migration
- Migrated from KAPT to KSP for faster and more stable builds
- Removed unused TikXML dependency
- Optimized APK size (18 MB release)
